title: GM18100
detail:
We used NVIDIA’s Jetson Nano to perform object detection using
OpenCV and ImageNet.
extended_details:
We envisioned a system to aid the visually impaired. We wanted to make objects in view
to a camera audible to the user. This required a small form factor computer with enough
compute, like NVIDIA’s Jetson Nano. We also sourced a USB web camera that we already
had. With the Jetson set up and camera connected, our main challenges included setting
up the imaging circuitry and using OpenCV for object identification. We weren’t able to
make it to the audible portion of our design.
